SafeBrowsingResponse().Description: This class should not be constructed by applications.

Parameters: boolean: true to enable Safe Browsing reporting.
backToSafety(boolean).Description: Act as if the user clicked the "back to safety" button.

Parameters: boolean: true to enable Safe Browsing reporting.
proceed(boolean).Description: Act as if the user clicked the "visit this unsafe site" button.

Parameters: boolean: true if the interstitial should show a reporting checkbox.

ClassDesc: Used to indicate an action to take when hitting a malicious URL. Instances of this class are created by the WebView and passed to @B_android#webkit#WebViewClient#onSafeBrowsingHit_E@. The host application must call @B_android#webkit#SafeBrowsingResponse#showInterstitial_E@, @B_android#webkit#SafeBrowsingResponse#proceed_E@, or @B_android#webkit#SafeBrowsingResponse#backToSafety_E@ to set the WebView's response to the Safe Browsing hit. If reporting is enabled, all reports will be sent according to the privacy policy referenced by @B_android#webkit#WebView#getSafeBrowsingPrivacyPolicyUrl_E@.
